cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Get ready to make some new friends in our Good Shared 8! Featuring 8 bunks in 30 sqm, this is the largest room at the lowest cost! Each bed has its own reading lamp and bed lockers. And guess what, the room comes with an en-suite bathroom too!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.labelDescription: Save even more money when staying in our Good Shared 6. Featuring six bunks fitting up to 6 people, this bright and clean room has everything you'll need: Free Wifi, individual bed lamp, bed lockers and an en-suite bathroom.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Shared rooms exclusively for female guests, including Toiletries & Hairdryer! This 16 sqm room comes with 4 bunks and super fast free wifi! Each bed has a plug station and a reading lamp. It also features a bathroom and bed lockers!

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: With different variations of twin and bunks beds, the 25 sqm room is perfect for a bunch of friends who still look for privacy. This spacious room comes with 4 desks, an ensuite bathroom,  linens and toiletries. USB plugs + individual reading lamps.
